title: Senior Frontend Developer (Vue3)
description:
Jobbify är en jobbplattform för vassa kandidater.
  
För kunds räkning har vi publicerat denna annons, vill du komma i kontakt med den slutgiltiga arbetsgivaren kan du klicka dig vidare till annonsen:
  
  

Who are we?
  
  

Nordhealth’s mission is to build software that improves the daily lives of healthcare professionals. We build software that empowers veterinary and therapy professionals to provide the best possible care experiences to their patients. Our products are used daily by over 50,000 professionals in clinics and hospitals across 30+ countries. We excel with 20+ years of experience in healthcare and veterinary software.
  
  

We understand that talent comes from everywhere and anywhere. The greater our diversity, the better the products we deliver. That’s why we are a remote-first company, headquartered in Helsinki, Finland, with all 400+ employees working either remotely or from collaboration hubs. While our market presence is currently strongest in the Nordics, our customer base is rapidly growing in our other markets too, especially in Europe and North America (more at our website nordhealth.com.)
  
  

About the role
  
  

We are here to create great healthcare products. That’s at our very core, but it’s the people who make companies great, not the other way around. We spend more time with our co-workers than anyone else in our lives. Being part of an exceptional team is not only important for your personal mindfulness but key for your professional progression.
  
  

We’re now looking for a Senior Frontend Developer to take part in the development of new features and the transition process of separating the frontend (Vue 3) from backend (Python/Django). They will develop features on the Vue 3 frontend using the Nord Design System and Nuxt 3. The key responsibility is to contribute to migrating the frontend and to architect, build and test features in the new Vue 3 frontend for Provet Cloud. Going forward, they will participate in the new developments and initiatives for the team defined by the OKRs. The Frontend Developer is expected to take responsibility in the front end developments for the product team independently, with the participation and support from the rest of the team and the Team Lead.
  
  

**Your key responsibilities include:**  

Architect, build and test features in the new Vue 3 frontend for Provet Cloud
  
  

Work with backend engineers to define requirements for REST API endpoints
  
  

Create a great user experience with help from UX Designers and Product Managers
  
  

Review work of peers and provide feedback to other engineers
  
  

Ensure best practices are in use for all frontend developments
  
  

Help maintain a culture of empathy, safety and belonging where all voices are heard
  
  

Work together with our internal design system team to integrate and evolve Nord Design System
  
  

Build new user-facing features with beautiful and scalable UI components
  
  

Improve frontend performance
  
  

Work on accessibility best practices
  
  

**Success factors and key challenges of the role:**  

Solid professional experience in software development, migrations and product maintenance.
  
  

Working in the domain area requires getting familiar with the main product along with various micro-services.
  
  

Close co-operation with the team and with other stakeholders is required. Independence in connecting with relevant parties and good collaboration skills are required in this role.
  
  

Courage to make conclusions and take ownership is a key to being successful in the role.
  
  

Capability to work under pressure with tight time schedules.
  
  

Enjoying collaboration with product, design, and other engineers to ensure high-quality product development..
  
  

Ability to prioritize work tasks and time management both independently and in collaboration with the team.
  
  

Individual OKRs will be set based on the team/ Business unit OKRs.
  
  

What will help you to be successful in this role?
  
  

Ideally, you have already gained some experience from working in a fast growing, global SaaS company. In addition, our humble wishlist would be that you:
  
  

Strong experience with Vue or other modern frontend frameworks, preferably using TypeScript
  
  

Experience with Vue 3 and Composition API is considered an advantage
  
  

Experience with Nuxt 3 is a bonus
  
  

Experience with automated frontend testing
  
  

Experience with design systems or Web Components is a big plus
  
  

Experience with Python/Django is a big plus
  
  

Experience in building accessible services
  
  

Knowing a thing or two about DevOps and CI/CD is a bonus
  
  

Fully proficient in English, written and spoken
  
  

What’s in it for you?
  
  

At Nordhealth, we do things a little bit differently. We value continuous improvement, diverse teams and autonomy which drive our collaboration. Our global healthcare domain is rapidly developing and we are seeking colleagues who enjoy working in this type of environment.
  
  

**In addition, we offer:**  

The chance to work in a meaningful industry and in a fast-growing, global company on a path to changing digital healthcare
  
  

Competitive compensation and benefits
  
  

Learning and professional growth opportunities
  
  

The tools you need, and enjoy using
  
  

Frequent company events and talented colleagues from around the world
  
  

If you enjoy working in a fast-growing and international environment with the possibility to make an impact, this might be the perfect job for you. Apply now! We'll fill the position as soon as we find the right person.

title: Test Developer
description:
**Test developer**

  


Together with the team you will develop and execute highly effective test solutions and test cases for fast and robust SW development providing excellent customer functions.


Quality can be measured and tracked, but it is more than that. Quality is a mindset that is tightly connected to Volvo Cars and our heritage. Quality is about respect for our customers as well as for ourselves. It is about what we do, how we do it and why we do it.


As a developer with an analysis and verification focus, you work in an agile cross-functional team. You use your test expertise to take an active role in coaching your team members in all matters relating to quality from a test perspective. This includes but is not limited to, ensuring testability while designing an architecture or developing a function, writing and sometimes guiding the team to write test cases and automating tests for regression testing. As a team player in an agile cross-functional team, you do what is necessary to achieve the team goals. Therefore, you will also learn and gain insights from other disciplines in the team.

  


**Main responsibilities**  

* Coach your agile team in test-related activities during design and development
* Design, implement and run test methods in an automated test environment
* Develop features in the test automation framework to enable more automated testing
* Report test results and appropriate recommendations to stakeholders
* Analyze defects and issues
  


**Required Qualifications**  

* Minimum a B.Sc. in Physics, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or equivalent
* Former experience from working with quality assurance of complex embedded systems
* Fluent in English (written and spoken)
* Valid driver’s license B
  


**Meritorious qualifications**  

* Experience from automotive and Body / Comfort systems development
* Experience of working with CANoe, Jenkins and other test framework
* Experience from working with Volvo systems such as Elektra, CarCom or System/Car Weaver.
* Experience of test automation, programming or model-based development / testing
  


**Personal qualities**  

* Analytical
* Cooperative
* Creative
* Innovative
  


**Contact Person**  

KASHIF QURESHI, Manager, +46 723716204, Kashif.qureshi@volvocars.com

  


**Volvo Cars - Driving change together**  

Volvo Cars’ success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with around 43,000 employees across the globe. At Volvo Cars, your career is designed around your skills and aspirations, allowing you to reach your fullest potential.
company_description: At Volvo Car Group, our vision is clear: "To be the world's most progressive and desired premium car brand".

title: Software Developer Core System Application Integration
description:
**Imagine the mobility of tomorrow**


Picture yourself in an exciting industry where the future revolves around leading-edge electrified and self-driving cars seamlessly integrated into people's daily lives. But how can we create this future in a way that is both safe and sustainable? This is just one of the inspiring questions we're working to solve here at Volvo Cars. Join us and watch your ideas shape the future of mobility.

  



Do you want to take part of a journey, building Core System Application Integration, from the ground up within a group where you have a great chance to influence your work? Are you a Software Developer with broad knowledge within both software domains, integration of test as well as hardware? Then we are looking for you!  

  

**Core System Application Integration – Let’s introduce ourselves!**

At Core System Application Integration, we are a tight agile team, building test environments for new platforms and programs. We design hardware rigs and are working with software and electronic integration striving to maximize the test-value. Our rigs are part of our Continuous integration (CI) and provide feedback of the system to enable high quality and robustness. We improve quality by enabling automated integration and visualize status of the system-under-test.

  


We are now looking for people to strengthen our team, within the field of test environment development. The task is to design new rigs, develop and maintain CI infrastructure and create, write, run and analyze automated tests for a new developed Platform within Software & Electronic Platform organization.

  


**What you’ll do**


As a Software Developer in this team, you will especially work with further development of our test activities to enable test automation and Continuous Integration (CI). In this team, you will work with the entire process from design of test infrastructure to analyze test results when the HIL rigs are up and running in the CI environment. We develop tool chains for test automation as well as develop test cases to verify the SW in Python, Groovy scripting and Vector CAPL. In addition, we use automation such as Ansible to orchestrate our rig park. We work on continuous improvements regarding test automation and fault tracing of both hardware and Software.


As a Software Developer of our HIL rigs, you will gain a broad understanding of Volvo Cars vehicle systems and electrical functions.

  


**What you’ll bring**


We believe that you have a genuine interest in Software and hardware in combination. And that you want to continuously improve our products, by analyzing fault slip thru and that you have our products in focus when you develop, to create a stable and robust CI flow that is easy to maintain.  

  

We believe that you have several years of experience in test development and test automation and that you can take an active role with test activities in our rigs. You enjoy the possibility to influence, and you love to be part of a team where we take own initiatives and take pride in your own and the team’s deliveries. We believe you enjoy great teamwork, are proactive, creative, driven, and willing to share knowledge and take responsibility. Also, you enjoy solving problems together with your team. You possess at least Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent.

  


Qualifications


* Experience from testing and fault tracing
* Experience of testing in CI context
* Proficient with Python programming, Robot Framework or CAPL
* Experience working in a large-scaled software company

  




Meritorious


* Experience of working with version- and revision control systems e.g. Git
* Knowledge of Jenkins or similar automation tool
* Worked with HIL rigs and automated test systems in Vector rigs
* Experience from working with Agile development process, e.g. Scrum
* ISTQB certification, or equivalent knowledge.
* Linux systems
* Experience from Ansible

  


**Volvo Cars - Driving change together**

Volvo Cars’ success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with around 43,000 employees across the globe. At Volvo Cars, your career is designed around your skills and aspirations, allowing you to reach your fullest potential.  



  

By 2025, we aim to sell 1.2 million cars annually, with 50 per cent being electric cars and sold directly to customers mainly through digital channels. Join us on this exciting journey as we pioneer the driving and electrification technologies of the future.
  

  

Curious about Life at Volvo Cars? Read more here  

Curious about our story? Read more here
company_description: At Volvo Car Group, our vision is clear: "To be the world's most progressive and desired premium car brand".

title: iOS-utvecklare
description:
Kundupplevelse, tillgänglighet och återanvändbara visuella komponenter triggar dig lite extra. Vi söker en erfaren iOS-utvecklare för att utveckla vårt designsystem och komponentbibliotek för din egen och andras iOS-utveckling.


ICA-Appen har ca 1.000.000 unika användare varje månad. Det du bidrar med kommer användas och påverka väldigt många människor i vårt avlånga land!


Om jobbet som iOS-utvecklare
I rollen som iOS-utvecklare kommer du att tillhöra två team; Appteamet som ICA-Appens produktteam och ICA Design System (IDS). Du kommer att sitta med, kommunicera och förankra med produktteamet för ICA-Appen medan du primärt arbetar i teamet IDS, där arbetet med vårt designsystem hålls ihop.


Du kommer att utveckla och underhålla ICA-appen med fokus på användarupplevelse. Som en del av vår tech stack kommer du att arbeta med Swift, SwiftUI, designarkitekturer som MVVM och MVC, REST API och GIT.


Du gillar att automatisera återkommande uppgifter och förstå vad som är viktigt för våra kunder. Du tar ansvar för produkten och tycker det är roligt att diskutera lösningar tillsammans med andra. Vi tror på att testa, utvärdera och lära oss kontinuerligt för att nå önskade effekter.


Är du den vi söker?
Du är en fena på att samarbeta och kommunicera på ett tydligt och ödmjukt sätt. Vi söker en iOS-utvecklare med ett seniortänk och gedigen erfarenhet inom utveckling av iOS-appar. Under dina år som utvecklare har du dragits mer och mer till den visuella och kundnära utvecklingen.


Du har omfattande kunskaper i Swift, SwiftUI och komponentutveckling. Du har också erfarenhet av olika designarkitekturer som MVVM och MVC, Enterprise-appar, App Store-publicering, REST API och GIT. Du strävar ständigt efter att hålla dig uppdaterad med de senaste teknikerna och skriva kod som är snygg, robust och testbar.


Du är nyfiken, tycker det är roligt att lära dig nya saker och delar gärna med dig av din kunskap. Kvalitet är alltid högsta prioritet för dig.


Vi har svenska som arbetsspråk så du behöver känna dig bekväm med att kommunicera både på svenska och engelska.


Vad händer nu?
Om du har frågor kring rollen är du välkommen att kontakta Jessica Wikander, rekryterande chef, 072-0855412. Om du har frågor kring process eller urval kontakta Markus Öhman, Talent Acquisition Partner, 076-6956204.  

  

Urval och intervjuer sker löpande så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt, dock ej senare än 2024-09-30.

  

ICA ska spegla våra kunder och samhället, vi strävar därför efter att anställa människor med olika bakgrund, kompetenser, kunskap och erfarenheter. Vi värnar om goda arbetsmiljöförhållanden med mål om helt rökfria arbetsplatser. Om roller kräver det så behöver du genomgå tester, bakgrundskontroller och drogtestning innan anställning.


Läs mer om hur det är att jobba på ICA.

title: Base Software Developer
description:
**Techster Solutions** befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst **1+** års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.

  

Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.

  

Rollbeskrivning:


Our client in the automotive industry is currently seeking a skilled BSW Developer to join their team.


As part of the BSW and Integration team, you will be responsible for delivering software packages related to Battery and Inverter Control systems for test vehicles and car projects.

**Main Responsibilities:**


Your primary focus will be on establishing a Base Software (BSW) for specific targets aligned with the Autosar standard. Your role will involve:

* Developing and configuring BSW for:
	+ System management
	+ Memory management
	+ Communication modules
* Performing requirement analysis, integrating BSW and Software Components (SWC)
* Managing issues, conducting investigations, and preparing technical documentation
* Collaborating closely with system designers, software architects, and developers to:
	+ Address questions on specifications and workflows
	+ Ensure system design integrity and meet quality assurance standards
* Set up Base SW for target-specific systems under the AUTOSAR standard.
* Conduct BSW development and configuration for system, memory, and communication management modules.
* Analyze requirements and integrate BSW with SWC.
* Handle issue management, including investigations and documenting technical aspects.

**Required Qualifications:**


To be successful in this role, you should have the following qualifications:

* A degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mechatronics, Applied Mathematics, or a related field.
* Proficiency in programming, specifically in C/embedded C.
* A solid foundation in Software Engineering principles.

**Additional Qualifications:**

* Knowledge and experience with AUTOSAR BSW.
* Previous experience in Embedded Software Development.
* Experience in the automotive industry.
* Familiarity with ISO26262 standards.

**Desired Attributes:**

* A structured and methodical approach to work.
* Enjoyment in facing and solving technical challenges.
* Strong documentation skills.
* A positive, team-oriented attitude with a willingness to share knowledge.
* Self-motivated, results-driven, and adaptable to changing conditions.

**Ansökan**  

Tror du att du är **Techster Solutions** nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.

**Arbetsplats och kultur**
--------------------------


Vi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.


Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Embedded-utvecklare till vårt In-house team i Jönköping
description:
Vi på Knowit Connectivity söker nu duktiga och ambitiösa individer till vårt kontor i Jönköping. Att jobba hos oss är varierande och utöver att du får jobba med spännande kunder och teknik, får du möjligheten att utvecklas med våra kunder och växa tillsammans med duktiga kollegor.

  

I vår region finns otroligt mycket spännande och duktiga företag som gör fantastiska produkter. Vi har bidragit inom flera olika områden, bland annat hos världsledande producenten av utomhusprodukter (läs mer här) men även i utveckling av framtidens helautomatiska kassadiskar. Att jobba på Knowit innebär att vi får vara med och glänta på locket och se tekniken bakom - och sedan bidra med våra kunskaper för att fortsätta utvecklingen.

**Vem söker vi?**


Vi söker dig som vill bidra med energi och engagemang till teamets leveranser och fortsätta din personliga utveckling här hos oss. Du har gedigen bakgrund som systemutvecklare inom inbyggda system och en vilja och ett intresse av att förstå våra kunders verksamhet, utmaningar och behov. Du är tekniskt intresserad och gillar att tillsammans med dina kollegor bygga de bästa lösningarna.  

  

Du har en tydlig uppfattning om vad du anser är goda principer för systemutveckling och best practices för en stabil teknisk plattform. Du tycker om att diskutera lösningar med kunder och kollegor och hjälpa till i relationsbygget mellan kunden och Knowit.  

  

Du bemästrar C och C++ och om du dessutom har jobbad med RTOS och Linux är det meriterande.  

  

Hur du utvecklas framöver och vad du vill jobba med i framtiden bestämmer du tillsammans med din chef, och ni gör tillsammans en planering för din framtida karriär.


Vi vill fylla på teamet med dig som är en vass utvecklare och intresserad av att bidra till vårt embedded community internt på Knowit i Jönköping. Vårt mål nu och framgent är att växa vår in-houseverksamhet och vi söker individer som kan vara med och bidra till vår framfart.

  

Att behärska både svenska och engelska är ett krav för denna roll då det används vid kommunikation hos kund men också i våra team.

**Vår inriktning på Knowit Connectivity i Jönköping**


Connectivity är ett affärsområde i det stora bolaget Knowit, vilket betyder att vi erbjuder en stabil arbetsplats, men med kreativitet och beslutsförmåga av ett litet bolag. I koncernen får du 4400 kollegor med mängder av spännande kunderfarenheter och kundkontakter, fast lön i och mellan uppdrag och en hel del andra förmåner.


Vårt fokus på Knowit Connectivity i Jönköping är att hjälpa regionens R&D-team att bygga och utveckla embedded, hårdvarunära och uppkopplad mjukvara. Vi har kunder inom en mängd branscher, bland annat telekom, textilbranschen och försvar.

**Vårt erbjudande till dig**


Vi växer nu våra in-houseteam men för dig som hellre föredrar att arbeta ute hos kund finns även det alternativet. Vi kan idag erbjuda bägge delarna.  

Oberoende av vilket uppdrag du hamnar i så har du möjligheten att växa inom ditt kompetensområde genom gott samarbete och erfarenhetsutbyte med dina Knowit-kollegor. Innan eller mellan uppdrag ser vi även till att utveckla din kompetens och ger dig möjlighet att pröva nya tekniker tillsammans med befintliga eller potentiella framtida kunder.  

  



Vi brinner för hållbarhet och att göra världen bättre med hjälp av innovation och digitalisering, och strävar efter att detta ska märkas i våra uppdrag hos kunderna.


**Kontakt och ansökan**


SÅ, känner du igen dig eller lockas av någonting du läst - tveka inte att höra av dig till oss så bekantar vi oss. Vi jobbar med ett löpande urval så känner du dig säker på att detta är något du vill vara med på - Ansök direkt!


Konsultchefer:
  

Joakim Gustavsson, joakim.gustavsson@knowit.se, 076-141 58 94  

Erik Engvall, erik.engvall@knowit.se, 073-640 50 52

**Vi ser fram emot att läsa din ansökan!**

* Vill du höra mer om vad våra medarbetare säger? Lyssna gärna på detta poddavsnitt: Spotify - Knowit Connectivity

* Du hittar oss också på LinkedIn: Knowit Connectivity

title: Mobile App Developer - React Native
description:
Odevo is a group of exciting brands with a shared vision of challenging the status quo in the property management industry. We're committed to revolutionizing the industry with innovative software solutions that make managing properties easier, more efficient, and more effective. Our global product development department acts as a SaaS supplier to all the companies in the Odevo group and several other players in the industry. Together, we will continue to challenge and change this industry. To continue our ambitious growth journey, we seek more great people to join us to build market-leading property management software products. Are you one of them?

#### **About the role**

  

As we continue to experience significant growth, we are looking for a mobile app developer to join a new team we are establishing in Sweden. This team will spearhead the development of a new product targeted at the U.S. market. In this role, you will work closely with designers and stakeholders to deliver a best-in-class user experience. From day one, you’ll have the opportunity to shape the product as part of a small, cross-functional team, where your decision-making skills and expertise will be highly valued. You will be developing using React Native.


Our agile approach, along with our emphasis on close teamwork and communication, creates an environment where your contributions make a real impact. Collaboration and helping each other are integral to our culture, and you will play a key role in every aspect of the development process, from ideation to architecture to release. We work closely with our end users, gathering feedback that helps us continuously improve.


#### **Who you are**

  

You thrive in a dynamic business environment that is constantly evolving, where you have the freedom to take initiative and implement your ideas. You strive for excellence in everything you do and always aim to deliver your best. You are not concerned with prestige and enjoy working in a collaborative team environment.


**Experience**


* 3+ Years of experience in mobile app development.
* Proficiency in React Native.
* Full experience in development and distribution of mobile applications (iOS and Android).
* Expertise on leveraging Apple and Google development portals.
* Web services (REST).
* Experience in PropTech or FinTech sectors is a plus.
* Experience or interest in AI tech is a plus.
* Fluency in English is required, Swedish and Spanish is a plus.

**What we offer**

* Hybrid/remote work environment - you will be part of a team based in and around Stockholm that values collaboration and communication, regardless of location.
* Professional growth - to work with the most talented developers in the industry.
* Modern technology - we invest in the latest technologies and tools and encourage our team members to share their ideas and take ownership of their work.
* Innovation - to work on exciting projects that push the boundaries of our industry and make a real impact.
* Commitment to quality - a dynamic and forward-thinking company that values profitable and long-term product development

**Location**  

We are remote-friendly, but we find great value in being able to connect with our teams in person. The team you will work with is in Stockholm, and the ability to spend face-to-face time with them is important.


**Excited?**  

Join us and be part of a new team that’s building innovative products from scratch for the U.S. market!


Why we formed Odevo  

About Odevo
  

Our Software

title: Senior Full-stack Developer
description:
**Who We Are**


At 55 Degrees, we’re dedicated to helping teams around the world achieve more with less stress. Our applications are used by diverse teams across the globe, from small startups to large enterprises. We believe in delivering exceptional products while maintaining a healthy balance in our lives. Our diverse and inclusive culture fosters collaboration, innovation, and continuous learning.

### **The Role**


We are looking for a skilled full-stack developer who is passionate about both back-end and front-end development. You will play a critical role in building and maintaining robust, scalable, and secure backend services that power our applications. Working in a small, dynamic team, you’ll have the opportunity to shape our applications, drive architectural decisions, and improve performance using a range of technologies.

### **Key Responsibilities**

* Develop, maintain, and optimize back-end services and APIs using Node.js, AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, ExpressJS, and other microservice technologies. Write efficient code and ensure the back-end systems are robust and secure.
* Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate and deliver seamless end-to-end solutions using React, TypeScript, Webpack, and related libraries.
* Participate in architectural discussions, code reviews, and sprint planning sessions. Ensure that all backend systems adhere to best practices for security, performance, and scalability.
* Write and maintain comprehensive unit, integration, and end-to-end tests. Implement security best practices to protect data and applications from potential vulnerabilities.
* Work closely with other departments to gain insights into the full customer journey, gather valuable feedback, and help shape the development of future features.
* Stay updated with the latest technologies, share your knowledge with the team, and contribute to our culture of growth and learning.

### **About you**


You value crafting well-tested, clearly-written code and understand it as a means to getting the right solution into your customers' hands. You desire more than just "getting the job done", but to learn something new every day and to leave the codebase better than you found it. Despite this, you don’t let a quest for perfection keep your team from delivering. When presented with a challenging situation, you are eager to jump in and help solve the puzzle.

### **Your day one qualities:**

* 5+ years of web development experience in an agile, cross-functional team using NodeJS, React and other modern frameworks.
* Proven experience in designing and implementing robust, scalable, and secure backend systems and APIs.
* Familiarity with front-end development using React.js and TypeScript to ensure seamless integration of back-end and front-end components.
* Experience with AWS technologies, including DynamoDB, Lambda, and other cloud-native services.
* Worked with MUI or similar React front-end frameworks.
* Worked with JWT, Oauth or similar technologies.
* Familiarity with Scrum/Kanban environments and experience using tools like Atlassian Jira.
* Excellent communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

### **We'd be excited if you:**

* Have experience developing applications for Atlassian Jira and/or Azure DevOps Marketplace.
* Have experience with Java and building webapps in it.
* Are passionate about creating intuitive user experiences and validating customer needs.
* Are knowledgeable about Lean and Agile practices and committed to sustainable development.
* Have experience mentoring or leading other developers, fostering a culture of growth and continuous improvement.
* Enjoy exploring new technologies and driving innovation within your team.

### **We offer you:**

* Hybrid-remote work
* Flexible hours
* 6 weeks prepaid vacation
* Occupational pension according to ITP plan
* Health insurance
* ‍️ Wellness allowance of 5,000 SEK / year
* Bus/train ticket benefit for those who prefer to commute
* Breakfast & Fika - Crackers and fika are always close at hand
* ‍️ Volunteer days - 3 paid days off per year to volunteer for a charity of choice
* Join regular after works and happenings!
* Team spirit - become part of a tight and successful team
* An individual learning & development plan

title: Systemutvecklare
description:
### **Arbetsuppgifter**


Vår kund söker nu ytterligare förstärkning för att utveckla och optimera deras automatiserade system. Du kommer att arbeta med att säkerställa att rätt säkerhet och kvalitet upprätthålls i open source-komponenter för utvecklingsmiljöer, samt med prestandaoptimering, validering och verifiering av systemet.


Vår kund arbetar med att utveckla avancerade ledningssystem för försvarslösningar inom sjö-, land- och luftområden.  

  

**Om teamet:**  

Du kommer att ingå i ett agilt team bestående av cirka 10 seniora utvecklare. Teamet arbetar självständigt med hög grad av samarbete och följer agila principer med fokus på flödeseffektivitet och regelbundna leveranser.  

  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:**  

* Systemutveckling med fokus på Go/Golang.
* Säkerställande av säkerhet och kvalitet i open source-komponenter.
* Optimering av prestanda, validering och verifiering.
* Samarbete med techteam, produktteam och andra intressenter för att uppnå bästa möjliga resultat.
### 
**Kvalifikationer**

* Erfaren programmerare med djup kunskap inom Go/Golang.
* Gedigen erfarenhet av utveckling i molnmiljöer och containerbaserade system, såsom Kubernetes och CI/CD-processer.
* Allmän förståelse för nätverk och distribuerade system

### **Personliga egenskaper**


För att lyckas i uppdraget som Systemutvecklare ser vi gärna att du har en stark kommunikationsförmåga och är skicklig på att samarbeta med olika team och intressenter. Du bör också vara problemlösningsorienterad och orädd för att ta dig an utmaningar samt våga utforska nya lösningar för att hitta den bästa vägen framåt.

  

### **När du blir en av oss**


Som konsult hos JobBusters kan du känna dig trygg med ett kollektivavtal i ryggen, tillgängliga konsultchefer och engagerade rekryterare. Du som konsult får även tillgång till vårt nätverk av spännande företag och uppdragsgivare! För oss är det viktigt att du som konsult trivs, känner en trygghet och gemenskap till oss som arbetsgivare. Vi erbjuder tjänstepension, löneväxling och möjlighet till flexpension. Du får även tillgång till vår förmånsportal, där du utöver friskvårdsbidrag har tillgång till mängder av rabatter och erbjudanden inom hälsa, hem och fritid, transport, sjukvård och mycket mer! Ditt välmående är av högsta prioritet för oss och vi erbjuder därför dig som anställd Företagshälsovård för att hantera vardagens alla utmaningar, både på jobbet och i privatlivet.

### **Lön**


Enligt överenskommelse.

### **Tillträde och ansökan**


Heltid, kontorstider. Vår kund önskar start omgående och uppdraget förväntas löpa i minst 12 månader med möjlighet till förlängning. Du kommer att vara anställd av JobBusters som konsult hos vår spännande kund. Vi går igenom ansökningarna löpande och i konsultvärlden går processerna oftast snabbt. Rollen kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan (gärna i Word-format). Sista ansökningsdag är 2024-09-13.

title: AI Business Developer - Vattenfall Customer Service Nordic
description:
**Om tjänsten**
---------------

  

Business Development is a unit within Customer Service Nordic, responsible for driving the strategy of Customer Service Nordic by leading business development and change initiatives. During the past year, we have been exploring what AI can do for us and as a result we have launched an ambitious plan for the next 2-3 years to accelerate our strategy utilizing the full potential of AI. We are now expanding the Business Development unit with dedicated AI Business Developers that will drive end-to-end delivery of AI initiatives to provide our customers with an improved and cost-efficient service experience.


As AI Business Developer, you will report to the Director of Business Development.

**Main Responsibilities:**

* Drive AI initiatives end to end, from idea to implementation
* Continuously analyze and iterate on improvement potential in delivery, both from a quality and efficiency perspective
* Create a deep understanding of the customer journey and become an expert on customers' service experience and expectations
* Monitor market trends and benchmark competitors' and other comparable companies' customer service offering
* Be a \"go-to person\" for the customer perspective internally within the customer service organization and towards other business areas within Vattenfall

**Din bakgrund**
----------------

 **Your Profile**


We are open to candidates with different levels of experience, but the most important thing is that you are a \"doer\" who gets things done. You should be driven by understanding how AI can help us develop and improve the customer service experience based on end-users' needs. You are self-driven and have a curiosity to look for challenges in delivery and present and implement solutions – guided by data. You work actively to build relationships internally and leverage your network to achieve your delivery targets. You prefer to work with short delivery processes, both by implementing smaller improvements with a short time to market and by dividing larger projects with long lead times into smaller partial deliveries. If you have experience in project management or participating in AI related projects, this is particularly advantageous.

* University degree within a relevant field
* Experience working with business or process development in customer service or similar operational environment
* Ability to analyze quantitative and qualitative data to identify problems/opportunities
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills
* Experience in change management and stakeholder management
* Experience in continuous learning/agile working methods/Lean is advantageous
* Experience in AI technology is advantageous
* Excellent English required, Swedish advantageous

**Mer information**
-------------------

 **Location:** Solna or Umeå

**Application:** Please send us your application with resume and cover letter by **September 30, 2024.**


We will be reviewing and interviewing candidates on an ongoing basis, so we kindly ask you to apply as soon as possible.


Selection tests are part of the recruitment process.

**Information**


For more information about the position, please contact the recruiting manager Sami Pulkkinen at sami.pulkkinen@vattenfall.com.


For more information about the recruitment process, please contact Anna Uppstroem@vattenfall.com


Union representatives for this position are: Shahriar Badiei (Akademikerna), Christer Von Ahn (Unionen), Mikael Mukka (SEKO), Cecilia Bodin (Ledarna). You can reach them via Vattenfall's switchboard, +46 8 739 50 00.

*At Vattenfall, we are convinced that diversity contributes to building a more profitable and attractive company, and we strive to be a good role model when it comes to diversity. Vattenfall actively works to ensure that all employees have the same opportunities and rights regardless of gender, ethnicity, age, gender identity or expression, religion or other belief, disability, or sexual orientation.*

*Vattenfall is part of Sweden's critical infrastructure, so many of our positions are security classified. If this position is security classified, a security check will be carried out before employment, in accordance with the Security Protection Act.*

**Om oss**
----------

  

Vattenfall is one of Europe's largest producers and retailers of electricity and heat. Our main markets are Sweden, Germany, the Netherlands, Denmark, and the United Kingdom. The Vattenfall Group has approximately 21 000 employees. We have been electrifying industries, powering homes and transforming life through innovation for more than 100 years. We are working for fossil freedom and are driving the transition to a sustainable energy system.


Vattenfall Customer Service Nordic is responsible for sales, billing, and customer service to Vattenfall's customers in the Nordics. Our headquarters are in Umeå, but we also have offices in Solna and Helsinki, and in total, we are about 300 employees who together support Vattenfall's various businesses through the customer interface. We are working for fossil freedom by guiding our customers to climate-smart solutions and we are passionate about quality and customer experience, having been awarded the best service in the Energy sector for the past two years. Our core value, People First, is embedded in everything we do, and we know that secure and engaged employees deliver the best customer experiences.


In 2021, Vattenfall Customer Service Nordic was awarded a prize from Unionen as Sweden's most LGBTQI-friendly workplace, and this year we have been awarded the Diversity Employer Gold by Women Ahead. We know that great working environment, first-class customer dialogues, and innovative thinking are based on all of us complementing each other. With us, you can proudly be who you are!


Vattenfall Customer Service Nordic is certified as a Great Place to Work®. The certification is based on an employee survey within the dimensions of Credibility, Respect, Fairness, Pride, and Camaraderie.

title: Fullstack Developer to Integration team \u007C SEB, Solna
description:
Private and Corporate Digital Channels mission is to provide a world-class customer experience for SEB customers. The channels we are covering are different segments within our Business, such as Internet bank, Business arena, Mobile applications and Nexus.
Now we are seeking for our new star in the Integration team who is driven to influence our application development for the present and for the future!
**What you will be doing**As a Fullstack developer you will work with development of SEB's API’s consumed by mobile applications for private, corporate and youth customers. You will be a part of a small team consisting of colleagues working with development, test and integration. In the role you will develop, maintain, design and implement new API’s. The applications displays most of SEB's services, therefore you will collaborate with a large variety of colleagues both from the IT and Business area. The applications are used by a large number of consumers, therefore we are actively ensuring that it is robust, scalable and accessible 24/7/365.  

**Who we are looking for**To thrive and succeed in this role, you take your own initiative in a technically competent team. As a person you can be constructive in a group and be inspired by taking responsibility and driving change through new technology. Thus, you will have the ability to collaborate with multiple colleagues, strong communication skills, driven and have an analytical mindset. You have a great interest in tools, architecture and design.

We believe that you have:* Experience in working with ASP.net and ASMX web services
* Experience in working with C#, YAML, GIT, TFS, Artifactory
* Experience in working with setting up and administrating a web site in IIS
* Experience of working with SQL to create, and edit tables and SPs
* Experience of working with CI/CD
* Experience of working with Design of API’s/micro-services and .NET Framewort/.NET
* Experience of working with Docker, Google cloud platform, Azure DevOps Server, OpenShift or similar platforms

  

Fluency in English is required as it is our corporate language
Fluency in spoken and written Swedish is also desirable (some documentation and code is written in Swedish).

What we offer
We offer many experiences and benefits to our employees, and there is nuance to every individual’s career experience, but the elements that define the core of our offering are:
* Deliver world-class service to customers
* Opportunities to help transform an industry
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Attractive compensation and benefits


Ready to join?
Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 30th of September 2024. If you have questions about the position, please contact Agnes Kemper at agnes.kemper@seb.se. Please note that we are not able to handle applications via email due to GDPR.
We look forward to hearing from you! **Learn more about working at SEB here**: www.sebgroup.com/career  

It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
company_description: More than 15.000 people work at SEB. Working in SEB means being part of an exciting journey, driven by digital transformation

title: Sharepoint Developer
description:
**We are looking for a Sharepoint Developer, we are on a cloud transformation journey to improve and modernize their collaboration, information creation and sharing by implementing and driving adoption of M365 tools and specifically building SharePoint sites for different communication needs. You will design and build a good search experience for SharePoint Online content together with developers in our Intranet team to fulfill a business need to improve an consolidate information search. Including work to analyze, design and develop a scalable solution to be used to further index relevant SharePoint Online content to Intranet search.**


### **Requirements**


* You have several years of experience working with SharePoint and OneDrive in a global organization.
* You are a senior expert and developer for SharePoint Online and have an in-depth technical experience of the different features, possibilities and boundaries within SharePoint, for it to be used to its full potential.
* You are used to both designs, develop and implement solutions with SharePoint Online according to Microsoft best practices in global organizations.
* You have deep knowledge in SharePoint Online and M365 search and know how to build integrations using App registrations including utilizing suitable APIs to gather and consolidate data.
* Together with Intranet developers you will investigate, design and build a solution where SharePoint consolidated data will be captured and further indexed to Intranet search.
* You appreciate an open and transparent environment where everyone’s opinion matters, and you enjoy cross team collaboration and value creation
* English.

title: Software Developer
description:
**As a Software Developer in this team, you will especially work with further development of our test activities to enable test automation and Continuous Integration (CI). In this team, you will work with the entire process from design of test infrastructure to analyze test results when the HIL rigs are up and running in the CI environment. We develop tool chains for test automation as well as develop test cases to verify the SW in Python, Groovy scripting and Vector CAPL. In addition, we use automation such as Ansible to orchestrate our rig park. We work on continuous improvements regarding test automation and fault tracing of both hardware and Software.**


### **Requirements**


* We believe that you have a genuine interest in Software and hardware in combination.
* And that you want to continuously improve our products, by analyzing fault slip thru and that you have our products in focus when you develop, to create a stable and robust CI flow that is easy to maintain.
* We believe that you have several years of experience in test development and test automation and that you can take an active role with test activities in our rigs.
* You enjoy the possibility to influence, and you love to be part of a team where we take own initiatives and take pride in your own and the team’s deliveries.
* We believe you enjoy great teamwork, are proactive, creative, driven, and willing to share knowledge and take responsibility.
* You enjoy solving problems together with your team.
* You possess at least Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent.

title: Java Developer with DevOps Experience
description:
**We are, on behalf of one of our customers, looking for a DevOps champion and Java backend developer to join their organization.** **We’re seeking an DevOps champion and Java backend developer to join the Configuration Platform team. Product configuration is an important area for our client where many of our products are customized for a specific customer need. Our client has developed a product configurator providing integrated configuration capabilities to various tools, including eCommerce and ERPs. During the coming years the configurator platform will evolve in multiple ways to broaden and deepen the configuration toolbox, including new functional features as well as technical leaps. The person shall have the ability to take an overall responsibility for supporting technical refinement/design, planning and delivery of new features (with support from existing team members).**
### **Assignment Description**


* DevOps champion in the team, including design and implementation of build & release flows.
* Backend development in the delivery of the configurator solution, including supporting our running infrastructure on-prem and in Azure cloud.
* Support the rest of the technical team in the third line support and continued development of existing platform


**Required Skills**


* Senior Java developer and DevOps engineer with at least 7-10 years of working experience.
* Vast experience from Java delivery primarily in a Java EE web application context (Spring, Spring boot).
* Strong skills in DevOps engineering with design and setup of DevOps jobs/pipelines using Azure Pipelines.
* Experience with configuration and setup of Azure component infrastructure in Azure cloud, including infrastructure as code using Biceps.
* Experience working Jenkins, GIT, Maven, Tomcat and web application hosting in a Microsoft Windows environment.
* Skilled in CI/CD pipeline development, using scripting language like PowerShell or Python.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills in Swedish as well as in English.


**Desired Skills**


* GraphQL.
* OAuth2 and Azure.
* Docker and similar tools.
* Elastic/Kibana.

title: Embedded C Developer
description:
**For our client we are looking for a Embedded C Developer. You will be part of the BSW and Integration team that has full responsibility for deliveries of SW packages for the Battery – and Inverter Control systems. You perform BSW development and configuration for system management, memory management and communication module. You will be responsible for requirement analysis, integration of BSW and SWC as well as issue management with related investigations and technical documentation. You will contribute to SW implementation and have a close collaboration with System designers, SW architects and SW developers. Together you will clarify questions regarding specifications, work processes, system design and quality assurance activities.**


### **Responsibilities**


* Set up a Base SW for a specific target under the AUTOSAR standard.
* BSW development and configuration for system management, memory management and communication module.
* Responsible for requirement analysis, integration of BSW and SWC.
* Issue management with related investigations and technical documentation.


**Required Skills**


* Degree in computer science, electrical engineering, mechatronics, applied mathematics or similar.
* Programming skills in C/embedded C.
* General solid knowledge about Software Engineering.


**Desired Skills**


* AUTOSAR BSW Knowledge.
* Experience from Embedded SW development.
* Work experience from the automotive industry.
* Experience with ISO26262.


**Personal Skills**


* Structured way of working.
* Likes technical challenges.
* Good documentation skills.
* Positive attitude, enjoys working in a team and share.
* Self-driven, result oriented and flexible.

title: EPiServer utvecklare sökes till ny stor kund
description:
Vill du jobba i en familjär organisation som värdesätter balans mellan arbete och fritid? Softronic har ett modernt hybridkontor med lokaler vid Hammarby Kaj och nära till kommunikationer. Hos oss finns möjlighet att jobba med GoodTech – ledande teknik som gör gott i samhället! Vi är certifierade inom hållbarhet och informationssäkerhet, vilket vi applicerar i våra kundleveranser och i vårt arbetssätt.  

På Softronic ser vi ett stort värde i våra team och vi drivs av vår värdegrund T.E.A.M. – Transparens, entreprenörskap, ansvar och mod. Vi arbetar agilt i tvärfunktionella team med spännande uppdrag.  

Nu söker vi dig med ca 3 års erfarenhet inom .NET och EPiServer/Optimizely CMS som inriktning. Vi har en större kund som vi rekryterar till och du får vara med att bygga upp teamet från start. Vi arbetar hybrid kombinerat med arbete på plats.


**Om rollen**  

I din roll som EPiServer-utvecklare kommer du jobba med digitala lösningar i en stor kundleverans. Syftet med ditt arbete är att nå kundens vision genom innovation, omvärldsbevakning och medverkan i att nå uppsatta mål.  

Du erbjuds goda utvecklingsmöjligheter i din utvecklarroll. Genom att visa framfötterna har du möjlighet att växa till en mer ledande roll med större ansvar för både den tekniska lösningen och leveransteamet.


**Dina arbetsuppgofter är bland annat:**  

* Ha en nyckelroll i ett agilt EPiServer-team. Teamet jobbar gemensamt med att vidareutveckla och förvalta kundens samtliga webbplatser och tillhörande digitala lösningar
* Utveckla i .NET och EPiServers produkter
* Arbeta med Jira och Confluence som arbetsverktyg


- Kravarbete, utveckla och driftsätta ändringar i både nya- och befintliga tjänster  

* Ha dialog med både kund, kravställare och dina kollegor i teamet

**Vi tror att du har:**  

- Högskole- eller universitetsutbildning inom system- och datavetenskap eller motsvarande utbildning  

* Certifiering inom EPiServer
* Ca 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet som utvecklare inom .NET och EPiServer
* Förmåga att obehindrat kommunicera på svenska och engelska i tal och skrift

**Meriter:**  

* Tidigare erfarenhet som konsult
* Kännedom om Microsoft Azure som PaaS och SaaS plattform


När vi ser till dina personliga egenskaper tror vi att du är analytisk, noggrann och initiativtagande. Vi tror att du kan säkerställa kvalitet genom förmågan att se till en produkts helhet och inte fastnar på en detaljnivå. Vidare hoppas vi att du arbetar bra självgående såväl som i team.


**Om Softronic**  

Vi hjälper våra kunder utveckla tjänster som förenklar människors liv och arbeten. “GoodTech – ledande teknik som gör gott i samhället” är den kraft vi bidrar med för att vässa affärer och samhällsservice med innovation, säkerhet och hållbarhet i alla lösningar.



Arbetet och arbetsplatsen ska skapa lust och energi och vi odlar aktivt en kultur där brädspelskvällar, löprundor med kollegor och en fika i solen får ta plats. T.E.A.M: Transparens, Entreprenörskap, Ansvar, Mod är våra värderingar eftersom teamet är så viktigt för oss. I teamet arbetar vi proaktivt och lösningsorienterat för att hjälpa kunderna i sin förﬂyttning.



Om det här låter som något för dig så är du välkommen in med din ansökan. Har du frågor, kontakta gärna Monica Lindén, monica.linden@softronic.se



Mäklare och säljare undanbedes, tack.

title: Business Developer (Hybrid Portugual - FR Fluent)
description:
**Wait a minute.**

**Deep inside you are looking for a new adventure with…**

* **Freedom: feeling free to work remotely or hybrid and being trusted to deliver**
* **Ambition:** growing up surrounded by smart colleagues driven to create an iconic brand like Nike
* **Impact:** contributing to transform people lives at scale and feel your own impact in the company


**And you deserve it because:**

* Are driven by **results and impact**
* Are passionate **about influence, negotiating, closing**
* Are known to build **strong trust and connection** in a heartbeat with multiple stakeholders


You also happen to want to use your experience as an awesome **Business Developer** to contribute to impacting the lives of thousands of people?


Then, you have found the next adventure that will fulfill you !


This is a **full-time position,** carried out from our beautiful offices in **Dubai, Lisbon** or the **comfort of your living room.**

**You have to be fluent in French with a strong English (most of our applicants are French-speaking and our internal language is English - this is a non negotiable requirement).**


 YOUR MISSION


-


You will be part of a top team of sales professionals.


Your primary objective will be to **create new opportunities by attracting ambitious students to our diverse range of trainings.**


Our sources of inspiration are Apple, Nike, Disney for their obsession of excelling and having a worldwide impact. You will be playing a pivotal role in making Paradox play at that level.


To do so, here are your 4 responsibilities :

**1 | Student Acquisition**

You identify, engage, and persuade new students to enroll in our courses.  

You generate new leads through email outreach to potential students.  

You aim to secure 1 to 3 new student enrollments daily.

**2 | Proactive Sourcing**

You organize LinkedIn or email campaigns via Hubspot to schedule meetings.  

You initiate outbound calls to qualified leads who are familiar and excited to chat with us.  

You propose any innovative way of identifying new students who could impact our business.

**3 | CRM Management**

You manage your calls, meetings, and reports via Hubspot.  

You ensure strategic, personalized business follow-ups on ongoing leads within your CRM.  

You're ready to leverage CRM for improved efficiency and effectiveness, and to identify new opportunities.

**4 | Tackling Objections**

You review 2-3 call recordings per week to improve your sales approach and objection handling skills.  

You are ready to propose 1-5 fresh ideas per month to enhance our offerings.

**5 | Event Participation**

You actively participate in both in-person and online Paradox events to sell our products.  

You assist in or lead at least two webinars per month

**IT MIGHT NOT BE FOR YOU**
---------------------------

### **-**


Let’s be clear, we are looking for someone who is not just Great, and for whom Paradox ambition isn’t just another cool project; but a true mission.


So if those **personal interests :** personal development / coaching / professional growth / education / edtech / teaching / edutainment **are not things you REALLY love, let’s forget it!**


Let’s forget about iit also if,

* You **don’t like to be challenged** and grow in your job
* You don't like **receiving or giving tough feedbacks**
* You **don’t question the status quo:** the process are there for a reason, we have always done it this way
* You **like to have very specific & fixed tasks** assigned to you. Be told what to do and how to do it.
* **Your only driver is joining a full-remote company**: yes, our company culture is cool, but we want people to care about our mission, products, and their job!

**JOIN US IF YOU CRAVE**
------------------------

### **-**

### ***Growth & Ambition***

  

We hire only the best, it’s exhilarating to be **surrounded by A-players who strive to perform** **whilst being in a good mood. You'll be working with some of the best minds. We understand that "A" people attract "A" people.**


No more bosses, but ongoing conversations to support your professional development.


️ Being part of an ambitious company with a lot of growth opportunities

***Impact & Meaning***

**Playing a crucial role in the development of a company** whose content and products are enjoyed by millions of people  

**Waking up in the morning knowing you are making a difference:** *we receive messages every day from clients who have successfully lost weight, quit smoking, reach a mile stone in their business, built better relationships, and made positive changes in their lives.*  

  

***But that’s not all, we believe that driven people deserve…***

***Freedom & Well Being***

A company culture based on autonomy & accountability  

A remote culture from day one with the freedom to work from wherever you want

**HIRING PROCESS**
------------------

### **-**


That job description resonated with you?


Click on "Apply for this position" and fill out a short questionnaire (7 to 8 minutes) to tell us more about yourself and send us your CV!

**A 15/20 minutes what’s app call** with **Chloé**, our HR coordinator, to tell you more about the challenge and see if it fits with your experience and expectations,


**A video call** with **Chloé** to do a deep dive into your career path and your ambition,


**A** **Role Play** with **Severine,** the hiring , to check in depth potential to join the team,

**A culture-fit video call** with **Timy** - our culture coach - to check in depth the alignment between you and our values and culture.


**Reference check** to get in-depth insights about how you work in different environments, make your onboarding easier, and give everybody on the team the insurance to be surrounded by A-Players.


**Welcome aboard!**

### **About our hiring process**


Our recruitment process is tailored to do our best to avoid that you or us realize that we’re not a perfect fit. Every step serves a purpose and will allow us to get to know you better as much as it’ll help you understand more where you’ll be stepping in.


We also want you to have time to ask all of your questions regarding the mission, the long-term vision of your team and the company, our values, with the relevant interlocutor in front of you.

**But maybe YOU WONDER WHAT’S OUR STORY ?**
-------------------------------------------

-


At Paradox, we are convinced that people do not want “just a job” anymore.


We are all craving to have an impact through our professional journey. Some want to start their own venture, some want to become an intrapreneur in their current organization, some others just want their day-to-day tasks to have more meaning.

**PARADOX HAS ONE GOAL: TO EMPOWER PEOPLE AND ORGANIZATIONS TO LIVE THEIR TRUE AMBITIONS.**


But where do we start?


If you have an interest in personal development, you probably already know that:

* Making things happen is a real struggle when you don’t know what truly inspires you and how to get there ;
* Available resources are either boring or full of crazy unsubstantiated theories .


It needs to change, and we’re here to make it happen!

**️ OUR AMBITION IS TO MAKE SUCCESS THE ONLY POSSIBLE OUTCOME FOR OUR CLIENTS (WHATEVER SUCCESS MEANS FOR THEM), BY CRAFTING INNOVATIVE & CAPTIVATING BREAKTHROUGH EXPERIENCES.**


In other words, we want to make personal growth **as entertaining as watching Netflix.**


How, you might be wondering?

* We travel the world and surround ourselves with **top entrepreneurs** *(Richard Branson - Founder of Virgin, Marc Simoncini - Founder of Meeting, Fred Mazzella - Founder of BlablaCar)*, **world** **athletes** *(Tony Parker - Hall of fame NBA Player, Frederick Bousquet - World record in 50m free swimming, Frank Leboeuf - WorldCup Footballer)*, and **artists** *(Gad Elmaleh - Comedian, Franck Dubosc, Barry Osborne - Producer of Lord of the Rings and Matrix)* ;
* We reverse engineer their **strategies for achieving success** and fulfillment and lean on the **latest researches** about neurosciences ;
* We deliver trainings & educational contents around Power Skills (critical thinking, productivity, leadership, public speaking, coaching, stress management, etc.), **self-growth and performance**, through a balanced set of **e-learning programs, events and edutainment videos** .


From one well-known Founder to a team of +60 people today (and counting!), this approach has paid off and enabled us to exceed 2 million followers on social networks, and to have thousands of people attending our online events and training courses.

**TOGETHER, WE ARE DRIVEN BY ONE DREAM:**

* Helping 100 000 people achieve their dream and display their pictures on what we call the “100 000 dreams wall” ;
* Giving our clients access to constant personal growth by reinventing their learning experience ;
* Leverage AI and other technology to provide an outstanding customized experience to millions of people for them to transform their lives.

**And that’s where you come in. Join the Paradox Revolution !**

title: Software Developer A-hub Luleå/Boden
description:
##### **A-hub är ett innovativt och snabbt växande konsultbolag inom teknik och IT som fokuserar på att matcha våra konsulter med attraktiva uppdrag. Vi leder utvecklingen inom löner, villkor och affärsmodeller, och befinner oss i en expansiv fas. Nu söker vi fler skickliga mjukvaruutvecklare till vårt team – dig som brinner för att skapa digitala lösningar och har ett brett intresse för utveckling.**

**Ansvarsområden**

* Arbeta med drift och utveckling inom hela den digitala teknikstacken: integrationer, drift, analytisk data och front-end.
* Designa, utveckla och underhålla mikroserviceinfrastrukturen för att möjliggöra skräddarsydda lösningar och integrationer baserade på verksamhetens behov.
* Samarbeta med domänexperter för att förstå deras arbetsprocesser och bygga lösningar som möter deras behov.
* Utveckla och upprätthålla DevSecOps-processer och styrningspolicys.

**Kvalifikationer**

  

* Du har en relevant utbildning inom datavetenskap eller liknande område, alternativt motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Nyfiken och öppen för nya idéer, men balanserar dem mot erfaren kunskap.
* Samarbetsinriktad, värderar olika perspektiv och arbetar mot konsensus.
* Serviceinriktad med stark kommunikationsförmåga och fokus på verksamhetens behov.
* Analytisk och strategisk, med förmåga att bryta ner problem och förstå organisationens mål.

**Tekniska färdigheter**


Exempel på tekniska färdigheter som är intressanta för oss:

* Erfarenhet av eventdriven mikroserviceutveckling med RESTful API, Kotlin och Spring Boot i containeriserade miljöer.


* IT/OT-integrationer och processdesign vid edge-noder mot processtyrd utrustning.


* Kunskap om meddelandebrokarplattformar som RabbitMQ.


* Automatiserad mjukvarubyggnad, testning och deployment med GitLab CI/CD.


* Infrastruktur som kod med Terraform.


* Erfarenhet av Kubernetes-kluster och arbete med AWS S3, Snowflake och dbt eller liknande.

##### **Vad vi erbjuder**


Vi erbjuder en dynamisk arbetsmiljö med möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling. Du kommer att vara en del av ett engagerat team som värdesätter innovation och samarbete.

 **Start:** Omgående eller enligt överenskommelse  

**Plats:** Luleå/Boden  

**Anställningsform:** Konsultuppdrag med möjlighet till tillsvidareanställning


Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär som mjukvaruutvecklare? Tveka inte att ansöka idag och bli en del av vårt team på A-hub!

title: Embedded SW Developer Apple CarPlay & Android Auto
description:
We're running an exciting mission. The mission developing the Android Infotainment Platform for current and upcoming Volvo, Polestar and other Geely brand cars.

### **More about us**


We are now looking for an embedded **SW Developer** within our R&D department, to be part in the development of our **projected functions** **- Android Auto Projection** (AAP) and **Apple CarPlay** (ACP).


We are developing the complete function inhouse, full vertical from low level modules up to application. AAP and ACP are important parts of HaleyTek’s platform and product offering and key selling features for our customers.


Join our team in Gothenburg as a **Software Developer** focused on creating cutting-edge infotainment systems for the automotive industry!

 **Location:** Gothenburg, Sweden

**The role**

  

As a SW Developer at HaleyTek you will be a part of a development team.


**You and your skills**

  

You are known as an awesome developer and have a personal interest in technology and love to make the best software product out there. You have extensive competence and experience from developing embedded software including architecture, methods and tools aspects and you are always up to date when it comes to SW development trends and industry standards. You have both broad and deep understanding of the different software development phases: software architecture, design, coding, testing, review, devOps. You have experience of ASOP.


You are a developer who is motivated by challenging tasks. You are passionate about bringing the best out of others and feel comfortable in mentoring and coaching. You have good communication skills and feel comfortable in doing technical presentations for stakeholders.


**Responsibility includes**

* Software development in the full vertical Android stack, with focus on the projected functions Android Auto Projected and Apple CarPlay.
* Development using C++, Java, Kotlin and the Android tool set.
* End-to-end responsibility, including design, architecture, documentation, implementation, and automated test cases.

**Required qualifications/skills**

* M.Sc. in Software Engineering or similar relevant experience.
* At least 6 years of software development in embedded systems.
* Experience in Android stack software development
* Experience in developing automated unit or integration test in C++/Java or Python.
* Experience in working with Git/Gerrit/Jenkins tools.
* Experience from working in a Linux environment.
* Excellent communication skills in English.

title: Software Developer III
description:
As the technology firm that created the mobile world and a rich history of 145 years of building ground-breaking solutions and innovative technologies supported by 60,000+ patents, Ericsson has made it our business to make a mark. When joining our team at Ericsson you are empowered to learn, lead and perform at your best, shaping the future of technology. This is a place where you are welcomed as your own perfectly unique self, and celebrated for the skills, talent, and perspective you bring to the team.
Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions (BEWS) is the group responsible for leading Ericsson’s Enterprise Networking and Security business. Our growing product portfolio spans across wide area networks, local area networks and enterprise security. We are the #1 global market leader in Wireless-WAN based enterprise connectivity solutions and are growing fast in enterprise Private 5G networks and Secure Access Services Edge (SASE) solutions.
How Will You Contribute to the Company?
Ericsson Enterprise Solutions is seeking an experienced software developer to design, develop, test, and deliver high-quality and high-performance user interface (UI) code in the private cellular network domain. This developer will work with user experience (UX) designers and product management along with other front- and back-end engineers to deliver solutions using a modern user interface. This individual should have three to five (3-5) years’ experience writing modern JavaScript, HTML, React, Redux and CSS. Experience with Back-end related languages such as Golang is not a must but a plus.
What You Can Expect:* A great climate and culture based on a passion for customer, partner, and company success
* Continued investment in you, your peer group, and your team through recurring team building activities and professional development
* Be part of a tight agile development team of around eight (8) people
* Great possibilities to expand into fullstack territory within the development team


What Will You Do?* Contribute to technical decisions for building a web application's user interface
* Participate in sprints to design solutions, estimate efforts, and collaborate with the team to effectively plan work
* Work with product management teams to define and design solutions to meet customer needs
* Test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
* Handle customer escalations


Qualifications
Minimum Qualifications:* Three to five (3-5) years of development experience
* Fluent in JavaScript, HTML, React, Redux, CSS
* Understanding of Agile development methodologies
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills
* Ability to work with remote teams
* Familiarity with Git, GitLab, and CICD pipelines
* High school diploma, GED, and/or equivalent professional experience


Why Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions?
At Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions, we are one team - all in on inclusion. Celebrating the uniqueness of our individual team members across the globe helps us build diverse teams where we all can thrive. Our connected, community-focused culture enables each one of us to perform at our best and fully be ourselves.  

Our values drive everything we do:* Respect: we don't point a finger; we lend a hand.
* Integrity: we do the right thing, even when it is hard; we make fact-based decisions.
* Perseverance: we accept and embrace change; we have a passion to win!
* Professionalism: we hold each other accountable.


We are creating the future of global connectivity and community. Come join us. You belong here.
Compensation & Benefits at Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions
At Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions, we know that our people are the key to our success. We offer a competitive compensation and benefits package to help with your individual needs and goals.  

Your Pay:
Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions offers a competitive salary with a focus on a global market. For many roles, the compensation package includes annual and incremental incentive plans; certain eligibility and pro-ration rules apply. The actual salary offered is dependent on various factors including, but not limited to, location, the candidate’s combination of job-related knowledge, qualifications, skills, education, training, and experience.  

Your Health:
Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions offers excellent, competitive employee benefits. Our global team members are eligible to participate in customary health and other benefit plans and programs based on location.  

Your Financial Security:
Where available, Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions offers an employee retirement plan.  

Your Time:
Your work-life balance is important to us. Where locally applicable, Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions provides generous paid time off, including: Flexible Time Off (FTO), four paid quarterly well-being days, and a Global Holiday schedule. Certain pro-ration rules apply to some time off benefits.  

Additional Benefits:
Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions offers other company-paid benefits such as a comprehensive International Employee Assistance Program, No Internal Meeting Fridays, and volunteer paid time off. *Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions’ Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Belonging mission is to create an inclusive work environment where all employees’ differences are celebrated, their thoughts matter, and everyone feels safe to bring their authentic selves to work. We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer and aim to attract, develop, and engage top talent from a diverse candidate pool. It is our policy and commitment to provide equal opportunity employment for all persons and not discriminate in employment decisions by placing the most qualified person in each job, without regard to any other classification protected by federal, state, or local law.*
Please note: Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions does not accept agency resumes and is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes. Please do not forward resumes to Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions employees.

title: Senior mjukvaruutvecklare Embedded (C++)
description:
Jobbeskrivning


Söker du efter en roll där du får jobba mer med design/arkitektur och tillsammans med andra seniora utvecklare tekniskt leda våra utvecklingsteam? Vill du utforska det du drömmer om, men behålla tryggheten och gemenskapen? Då är det dig vi söker! Hos AFRY kan du utforska olika karriärmöjligheter inom infrastruktur, industri, energi och digitalisering.


Hos oss kommer du att få arbeta som senior mjukvaruutvecklare och bidra med djup kunskap inom hårdvarunära mjukvaruutveckling. Du är väldigt bekväm med språk som C/C++ och Linux-plattformar och har förmodligen en mängd meriterande kompetenser som t.ex:

* Python, Java eller C#
* CI och DevOps
* Yocto


På AFRY arbetar vi inom ett brett spektrum av branscher och projekt, antingen hos kund eller internt hos på AFRY. Våra kunder finns främst inom telekom, fordon, medicinteknik och försvar. Hos oss har du en trygg anställning med kollektivavtalade villkor, bra förmåner och en organisation som bryr sig. Hos AFRY kan du vara dig själv!


Start: Omgående med hänsyn till uppsägningstid | Placeringsort: Stockholm | Lön: Efter överenskommelse


Kvalifikationer


Vi tror att du har en ingenjörsexamen, antingen genom en BSc Eller MSc, i datavetenskap, elektronik, mekatronik, telekommunikation, inbyggda system eller motsvarande. Du har troligtvis ett stort intresse för inbyggda system och har minst 6 års erfarenhet inom C/C++.


Du tycker om att dela med dig av dina kunskaper till dina kollegor. Du har en god samarbetsförmåga, trivs med att ha mycket ansvar och möjlighet att påverka. Utöver detta kommer du gärna med nya förslag och idéer för gruppens framtida utveckling. Du talar och skriver flytande svenska och engelska då detta krävs i kontakt med kollegor och kunder.

*Urvalet sker löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag!*


Företagsbeskrivning


AFRY är ett ledande europeiskt företag med global räckvidd inom teknik, design och rådgivning. Vi accelererar omställningen mot ett hållbart samhälle.


Vi är 19 000 hängivna experter inom infrastruktur, industri, energi och digitalisering, som skapar hållbara lösningar för kommande generationer.


Ytterligare information


Hos oss jobbar du hos en attraktiv och spännande arbetsgivare med människan i fokus! AFRY är till exempel rankad som en av Sveriges mest populära arbetsgivare bland ingenjörer.


Utöver detta erbjuder vi till exempel:

* 28 dagars semester
* Balans i arbetslivet
* Tillgång till många aktiviteter genom vår sociala klubb: Club AFRY, till exempel Hackathons, Yoga med mera
* Konkurrenskraftiga förmåner gällande pension, friskvård och föräldraledighet
* Företagsrabatter med externa partners genom vår förmånsportal: Advantage You
* Restauranger och kaféer på plats (platsberoende)
* Ett enormt nätverk av utvecklare

+ 19 000 kollegor med kontor i 50 länder men projekt i 100  
* 

Kontaktuppgifter för frågor  

Maja Lindqvist  

Rekryterare  

maja.lindqvist@afry.com  

Om rekryteringsprocessen:  

Vår rekryteringsprocess består av en kortare telefonintervju, programmeringstest alt. logiktest, cirka 1-2 fysiska/digitala intervjuer och slutligen referenstagning.

*I vår jobbansökningsguide kan du hitta mer information om rekrytering inom AFRY:* https://afry.com/en/join-us/job-application-guide

*På AFRY driver vi förändring i allt vi gör. Vi anser att förändring sker när modiga idéer möts, när vi samarbetar, skapar innovation och omfamnar kreativa lösningar, det är så vi skapar framtiden. Vi söker konstant kvalificerade kandidater som vill ansluta sig till våra inkluderande team runt om i världen. Bli en del av oss och påskynda den gröna omställningen*


Apply information


Position


Senior mjukvaruutvecklare Embedded (C++)
Location


Stockholm
Country


Sweden
