title: Senior Global Solutions Architect - Auto OEM, Auto & Manufacturing
description:
* Experience within specific technology domain areas (e.g. software development, cloud computing, systems engineering, infrastructure, security, networking, data & analytics).
* Experience in design, implementation, or consulting in applications and infrastructures
* Experience in IT development or implementation/consulting in the software or Internet industries


Amazon Web Services (AWS) is looking for experienced and motivated technologists who possess a unique balance of technical depth and strong interpersonal skills. You will partner some of the worlds largest Automotive and Manufacturing companies, to craft highly scalable, flexible and resilient cloud architectures that address customer business problems and accelerate the adoption of AWS services. In collaboration with account managers, you will assist in driving growth across a set of global customers in your defined country. As a trusted customer advocate, the solutions architect will help organizations understand best practices around advanced cloud-based solutions, and how to migrate existing workloads to the cloud. You will have the opportunity to help shape and execute a strategy to build mind share and broad use of AWS within enterprise customers. The ability to connect technology with measurable business value is critical to a solutions architect. You should also have a demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, products, and technical challenges.
  
  

**Here are some other qualities we are looking for:**  

Be great fun to work with.
  
At AWS, we have a credo of “Work hard. Have fun. Make history”. In this role, you will love what you do, and instinctively know how to make work fun. You will be dynamic and creative, and willing to take on any challenge and make a big impact.
  
  

Enjoy working with large, global customers. You will have a passion for educating, training, designing, and building cloud solutions for a diverse and challenging set of enterprise customers.
  
  

Have a strong understanding of large scale computing solutions. The ideal candidate will have past experience working as a systems or support engineer. You will enjoy keeping your existing technical skills honed and developing new ones, so you can make strong contributions to deep architecture discussions. You will regularly take part in deep-dive education and design exercises to create world-class solutions built on AWS.
  
  

Key job responsibilities
  
As an AWS Solutions Architect, you will have ownership of the technical relationship with customers, making recommendations on security, cost, performance, reliability, operational efficiency and best-practice architectures.
  
  

Internally, you will be an advocate acting on behalf of the customer to help drive continual improvements to the AWS platform, sharing their needs and wants to inform the roadmap of AWS features and services. You will also help shape the future of the Solutions Architecture organisation by helping to hire, coach and mentor others.
  
  

In this role, your creativity will link technology to tangible solutions, with the opportunity to define or invent cloud-native reference architectures with the worldwide AWS Solutions Architect community. You will participate in the creation and sharing of best practices, technical content and new reference architectures (e.g. white papers, code samples, blog posts) and evangelise and educate about AWS technology (e.g. through workshops, user groups, meetups, public speaking, online videos or conferences).
  
  

If you can educate AWS customers about the art of the possible, while inspiring the impossible, come build the future with us.
  
  

About the team
  
AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector. The AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support also partners with a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services.
  
  

Diverse Experiences
  
Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
  
  

Why AWS
  
Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
  
  

Work/Life Balance
  
We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why flexible work hours and arrangements are part of our culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
  
  

Inclusive Team Culture
  
Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
  
  

Mentorship and Career Growth
  
We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
  
  

* Experience working within software development or Internet-related industries
* Experience migrating or transforming legacy customer solutions to the cloud
* Experience working with AWS technologies from a dev/ops perspective
* Experience in technology/software sales, pre-sales, or consulting
* Excellent command of the Swedish language in both written and verbal forms is highly desired


Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

title: Senior Sales Executive
description:
Join Nordcloud and make your mark on the European IT industry. Help our clients thrive on their cloud journey in solution areas such as infrastructure, migration, data, and security.


**Currently, we are looking for a Senior Sales Executive to join our team in Sweden.**


**Your** **daily responsibilities:**

  

* As Sales Leader, winning new logos for Nordcloud Sweden in Enterprise and Corporate business segment
* Achieving sales targets in consultancy & service sales from target clients in scope
* Developing sales strategy in the allocated territory
* Being a trusted advisor to the customer by developing a deep understanding of target customers' business
* Developing and building relationships with C-level and senior executives at current and potential clients, both in strategic and tactical level in governance
* Implementing a solution-based approach while managing and understanding complex customer needs through the sales process
* Ensuring that current and new clients implement strategies that maximize Nordcloud's value proposition, including infrastructure, application, managed services and consulting portfolio
* Working closely with our partners at Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud
* Providing timely and insightful market feedback to other functional teams including product management and marketing
* Presenting Nordcloud at events and in the media by attending trade shows and special events
* Occasional travelling in Sweden or Europe may be an option, depending on the assignment and your preferences


**Your key skills:**


* 7+ years of sales experience within the area of IT Consulting / Technology
* Proven track record in leading, winning and developing new logos in IT Consultancy and Service business
* You already have a developed stakeholder network in the industry with clients as well as partner echo system
* Proven ability to Solution Sell, empathize and develop customized value propositions for clients and prospects
* Experience in driving sales within enterprise and mid sized corporations
* Experience from adopting a Challenger sales methodology in all client interactions
* Experience from working directly with C-level stakeholders and senior IT executives
* Experience with enterprise RFP processes
* Drive, passion, and team spirit
* Excellent communication, presentation, and organizational skills
* Ability to succeed in a fast-paced, high growth and rapidly changing environment
* Bachelor Degree or equivalent preferred (Business, Engineering, Computer Sciences)
* Customer-first attitude and experience in serving large-scale customers
* Fluent communication skills in **Swedish** and **English**


**Skills we'd consider a plus:**


* Experience in Cloud Services technical offering, processes, and tools
* Public cloud experience (AWS, Azure, and/or Google Cloud)


We encourage you to **apply**, even if you don't meet all of the requirements. We value your growth potential and enthusiasm!

  

**What we offer:**

  

* Individua**l training budget** and **exam fees** for certifications
* Flexible working hours and hybrid working model
* Laptop and equipment of your choice
* **Local package** such as six weeks of vacation, a pension package, private health care through EuroAccident, wellness benefits (Friskvårdsbidrag), and you can also pick more benefits from benify.se
* We are part of the collective bargaining agreement (Almegas Kollektivavtal - Tech Sverige)


Please read our Recruitment Privacy Policy (https://nordcloud.com/recruitment-privacy-policy/) before applying. **All applicants must have the right to work in Sweden.**


**About Nordcloud**


Nordcloud, an IBM company, is a European leader in cloud advisory, implementation, application development, managed services, and training. We are triple-certified across Microsoft Azure (https://nordcloud.com/multi-cloud/microsoft-azure/), Google Cloud (https://nordcloud.com/multi-cloud/google-cloud/) and Amazon Web Services (https://nordcloud.com/multi-cloud/amazon-web-services/), and we are recognized as a 'Visionary' by Gartner for Public Cloud IT Services. With 10 European hubs and over 1200 employees, we are known for our innovative cloud-native solutions and we have delivered over 1000 successful cloud projects (https://nordcloud.com/case-studies/).


Learn more at nordcloud.com (https://nordcloud.com/) and follow the #NordcloudCommunity (https://www.instagram.com/nordcloudcommunity/).

  

*Nordcloud values diversity and is dedicated to providing equal opportunities for all candidates and employees.*

title: Junior Smart Cloud Engineer till Nordomatic!
description:
Hos Nordomatic är ingen dag den andra lik. Speciellt för dig som gillar förena din fallenhet för människor med ditt intresse för teknik. Du är med och bidrar till säkra och smarta lösningar och arbetet görs primärt från kontoret.
 


  


 Vi söker dig som har god teknisk förståelse, samtidigt som du tycker om att jobba projektbaserat och med människor. Som en bonus får du vara med på tåget att skapa en mer grön och hållbar fastighetsdrift!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Nordomatic Aktiebolag
 



  

**Plats :**
 Johanneshov, Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Teknik
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, långsiktigt
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Hösten 2024
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Som Junior Smart Cloud Engineer på Nordomatic är du med och utvecklar den tekniska infrastrukturen på en av samhällets absoluta byggstenar. Här får du chansen att driva affären framåt genom att se över kretsscheman, placera ut symboler inom VVS, samt avlasta teamet. I den här rollen kommer du se över det som levereras till kund och säkerställa att leveransen alltid håller högsta kvalitet.
 


  


 Det finns många utvecklingsmöjligheter för dig som vill växa på en arbetsplats som präglas av öppenhet och högt i tak. Bland annat finns det möjligheter framåt att arbeta med budgethantering, granska och ta emot inkommande handlingar och delta i alla projektfaser.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En långsiktig anställning som anpassar sig efter dina intressen och förmågor
  
* En möjlighet att arbeta nytta för både samhälle och miljö
  
* En konsultchef som är mån om dina intressen och din professionella utveckling
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Följ driftskortsmallar och instruktioner från kund
  
* Rita driftbilder och placera ut symboler
  
* Utföra egenavprovning enligt protokoll
  
* Arbeta i databaser och i projekt
  
* Utföra samordnade avprovning med styrentreprenörer
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Innehar en gymnasieexamen gärna inom datateknik, IT eller fastighetsdrift
  
* Kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska i både tal och skrift
  
* Har en god teknisk förståelse
  
* Innehar B-körkort
  


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har**



  

  
* Erfarenhet av att serva och underhålla teknisk utrustning
  
* Kunskap om nätverk och IP-adresser
  
* Erfarenhet från fastighetsbranschen, industriarbete eller som drifttekniker
  


  


 Kunskap kan erhållas genom utbildning, erfarenhet eller att vara självlärd.
 


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* **Social och lättlärd**
 - Du tycker om att jobba med människor och är nyfiken på att lära dig nya saker
  
* **Samarbetsvillig**
 - Trivs med att arbeta i team och ta del av andras arbete
  
* **Strukturerad**
 - Höga krav på noggrannhet och att följa protokoll
  
* **Flexibel och initiativtagande**
 - Att hjälpa till hos andra team i perioder med mindre jobb och alltid vara redo för nya uppgifter
  


  


  

**OBS:**
 Ett utdrag ur belastningsregistret kommer göras på den kandidat som får erbjudande om jobbet.
 


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Nordomatic Aktiebolag**

 Nordomatic är en specialiserad tillväxtkoncern med fokus på 'smart buildings' och energieffektivisering i större fastigheter. Verksamheten startade 1967 och är idag den ledande, oberoende partnern inom fastighetsautomation. Koncernen är verksam i Sverige, Danmark och Norge. I Sverige finns kontor på 11 platser i landet. Nordomatics huvudkontor ligger i Stockholm/Globen. Sedan 2017 är Nordomatic ett certifierat Karriärföretag. Lär mer om dem på www.nordomatic.se
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Erik Gund eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på sth4@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15106591

title: Solutions Architect(Snowflake)
description:
Gather and analyze requirements, ensuring designs meet business goals, scalability, performance, and security. Evaluate technologies (Snowflake / AWS / DBT) for compatibility, ensure adherence to best practices, and provide technical guidance. Oversee architecture, data migration, and platform optimization. Experienced in data modeling, cloud migration, compliance, and database systems like Snowflake, SQL, and NoSQL with 10+ years in data architecture.
 




  






 Solution Architect JD:
 





 1. Someone who has proven experience in ML/AI stack in AWS and Snowflake ecosystems.
 





 2. He/she should be able to work with the business analyst community to understand their requirements, provide appropriate solutions using appropriate tools/technologies, suggest improvements in Ways of Working, etc.
 





 3. Gather and analyze business and technical requirements
 





 4. Ensure designs align with business goals, scalability, performance, and security requirements
 





 5. Evaluate and ensure selected or new proposed technologies and tools are compatible with the overall target architecture
 





 6. Ensure adherence to architectural principles and best practices during the execution phase
 





 7. Identify potential risks and implement migration strategies
 





 8. Review and approve technical designs, code, and configurations
 





 9. Provide Technical guidance to development teams during the execution phase
 





 10. Create and maintain comprehensive documentation, including architecture diagrams, migration plans and technical specifications.
 





 11. Recommend and implement continuous improvements to the data platform.
 





 12. Ensure changes are reviewed, aligned, and approved

title: Director, Area Lead Engineer – Data Engineering, AI Analytics & Data
description:
**Company Description**
 H&M Group is a family of brands; H&M, COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET and Afound. At H&M Group, our people are the driving force behind our commitment to creating meaningful growth and more sustainable lifestyles. Help us re-imagine fashion and together we will re-shape our industry. Learn more about H&M Group here.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Are you a Director of Data Engineering with a desire to make an impact and steer one of H&M’s most crucial sectors? If you are ready to take a pivotal role in shaping the future of retail, we have the perfect role for you.
   

  

 As the Area Lead for Data Engineering within our Supply Chain & Enterprise division, you will have considerable influence across the entire organization. Your role will be central to our company-wide programs, directly impacting a key area of H&M. You will engage with a multitude of stakeholders, fostering strong relationships that are the cornerstone of our collaborative culture. Your goal is to embody the principles of servant leadership, where a significant portion of your role will be dedicated to people management. The supply chain is the heart of H&M, and your leadership will ensure its rhythm is strong and steady.
   

  

**Key responsibilities:**
* Lead and mentor a team of Engineering Managers, providing strategic guidance, setting performance goals, and fostering a collaborative and innovative environment
* Collaborate with stakeholders to define the strategic direction, aligning it with business goals and customer needs
* Define high level KPIs and targets for the area
* Driving program enhancements and optimizing delivery outcomes


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field
* At least 8 years of experience within Data Engineering or similar areas
* A background in supply chain is highly beneficial
* Proven experience in leadership roles within data engineering. Preferably experience in leading managers.
* Strong proficiency in SQL, Python, and big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark)
* Familiarity with cloud services (GCP, AWS, Azure) and data warehousing solutions
* Excellent problem-solving and project management skills


**What you need to succeed:**
* A passion for data and its potential to drive business success
* The ability to inspire and lead teams towards achieving technical excellence
* Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with stakeholders
* A commitment to staying current with the latest industry trends and technologies


 If you are a strategic thinker with a track record of leading successful data engineering projects, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity to shape the future of data within our company.
   

  

**Additional Information**
 This is a full-time position based in Stockholm. Apply by sending in your CV in English as soon as possible, but no later than 30-June 2024. We will review and interview candidates ongoing. Due to data policies, we only accept applications through the career page.

title: Graduate Program
description:
**Influence Tech’s graduate program, Bloom, for tech management consultants** 




  





 You’ll learn your craft alongside some of the best, most experienced consultants in the business – and get the chance to make suggestions, shake things up and forge your own career path.
 



 In August 2025, Influence Tech will once again run its graduate program Bloom together with our Newground Alliance consulting company partners. The program will kick-start your career and provide you with opportunities to support real project deliverables, engage directly with clients, and explore how tech can enable business value. The program will equip you with the skills needed to succeed in your career as a tech management consultant and allow you to explore exciting areas of emerging technologies.
 



  





 To read more about the Bloom program and what you will learn, visit
 **Bloom25** 








  





  





**Who are we looking for?** 




  





 Management consultants at Influence Tech are entrepreneurial, driven by solving complex problems and exploring the intersection between technology, people, and business. We are looking for individuals who are curious, driven and have great analytical and collaborative skills. To thrive and succeed in the role we believe that you are brave, innovative, and a person that takes initiative. You have a higher education at master’s level and you communicate fluently in both Swedish and English.
 



  





  





**What we can offer** 




  




* The opportunity to work on exciting projects in small teams, in the areas such as automation, data, cloud, and architecture
* You will be supporting and driving deliverables for exciting and innovative tech projects
* You get to work alongside industry experts within the tech management sector
* To work in a flat hierarchal company with a focus on other things than administration and internal processes
* A culture that is warm and friendly as well as a lot of social activities
* To work at a company that values work/life balance







  





  





**Who we are and what we do** 




  





 We are Tech Management Consultants. Creating value by tech expertise and collective intelligence. Combining technology and data capabilities with a human-centric approach. We ensure correct strategies and business goal alignment when delivering technology projects, establishing services, and providing technology leadership. Within the company, there is an entrepreneurial mindset and you as an employee have great opportunities to make a difference and setting a footprint.
 



 To read more about who we are and what we do visit
 **Influence Tech Bloom 25** 




  





  





**The recruitment process** 




  




1. Application
2. Testing
3. First interview
4. Recruitment day
5. Final interview
6. Offer



  





  





 Our selection process has started and the last day to apply to the program is the 24th of November. Please submit your application today since selection is done continuously, so don't miss your chance to join Influence Tech!
 



  





 If you have any questions about the program, our company, or the recruitment process, you are welcome to contact
 **talent@influencetech.se** 




  





 Does Influence Tech sound like a good match for you? Apply now!
 



  





 Are you looking for a different specialization? Visit
 **Newground Alliance** 
 for other opportunities within Bloom25.

title: IT Security Architecht
description:
*Drivs du av att se dina idéer bli verklighet? Välkommen till vår spännande och teknikintensiva värld.*
**Din roll**
 Central IT-säkerhet är en av hörnstenarna för säkerheten inom Saab då den stödjer IT-organisationen och verksamheten att implementera och följa Saabs IT-säkerhetskrav. Som medlem i vårt team bestående av arkitekter och Compliance Officers kommer du att vara en viktig del av enheten för leverans av IT-säkerhet. Du kommer även att spela en strategiskt viktig roll för att skydda såväl verksamheten som våra operationella enheter, genom att stödja vår tjänsteleverans. Som IT-säkerhetsarkitekt rapporterar du till chefen för IT-säkerhetsramverk och efterlevnad (IT Security Framework and Compliance).
   

  

 Rollen inkluderar huvudsakligen följande uppgifter:
   

  

* Designa och vidmakthålla en övergripande plan för att skydda organisationen från säkerhetshot mot våra IT-miljöer.
* Stötta i arbetet med framtagande av ett övergripande ramverk som ska säkra Saabs IT med riktlinjer och efterlevnad av regelverk.
* Ingå i ett team av arkitekter och Compliance Officers som dagligen bidrar till att stödja verksamheten med säkerhetsarkitektur, riskbedömning, identifiering av sårbarheter och kontroller genom hela Saabs IT.
* Kontinuerligt samarbeta med andra team för att säkra att säkerhetsåtgärder integreras över hela organisationen.
* Ge expertis och hjälp att bygga Saabs säkerhetsförmågor i molnleveranser.
* Balansera säkerhetsnivå och säkerhetskrav med verksamhetens/organisationens mål.


**Din profil**
 För att lyckas i rollen som IT-säkerhetsarkitekt ser vi gärna att du är proaktiv och driven samt har ett stort intresse för cybersäkerhet. Dessutom tror vi att du har fokus på kunden och leveransen, med en god analytisk och lösningsorienterad inställning. Vi ser även gärna att du har tidigare erfarenhet av strategisk-, taktisk och operativ planering.
   

  

 Du kommer att vara placerad på någon av våra orter: Linköping, Alvik eller Göteborg.
   

  

 För att trivas i rollen tror vi att du har några av följande färdigheter eller erfarenheter:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av IT-säkerhetsarkitektur och cybersäkerhetsramverk.
* En förståelse av att arbeta med riskhantering för att identifiera och bedöma sårbarheter och potentiella hot.
* Tidigare erfarenhet av strategisk-, taktisk och operativ planering kopplat till IT-säkerhet.
* Tidigare arbetat med IT-säkerhet och efterlevnad i relation till molnmiljöer och Zero Trust.
* Arbetsmetoder som DevSecOps och Security Champion program.
* Erfarenhet av säkerhetsstandarder både inom området cybersäkerhet och fysisk säkerhet (ISO 27 000, NIST, CMMC, ISM etc.)
* Magister/kandidatexamen eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet inom relevant område (cybersäkerhet, datavetenskap eller liknande område).
* Goda kunskaper i både svenska och engelska, tal och skrift.


 Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.
   

  

**Vad du blir en del av**
 Bakom våra innovationer finns alla de som har gjort det möjligt. Modiga pionjärer och kluriga tänkare. Vardagshjältar och kreativa problemlösare. De som delar djup kunskap och de som utforskar nya områden. Och alla däremellan.
   

  

 Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 22 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här
   

  

 Vänligen observera att vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum har gått ut.
